divs: Sighting DetailsWith two of us in the auto coming out of Nashville headed East on I-24 - just before the Mufreesboro exit we both witnessed a dark object bobbing up and down - poking out of the top of a "cloud" (?). Moving side to side as well. After several minutes of this odd movement the object was gone. As we traveled toward the area where the object had been spotted - there were NO clouds. During the sighting we both noticed a white helicopter in the same vicinity. As quickly as the object disappeared......the helicopter was gone as well.
Summary: For several minutes the dark object poked in and out of a "cloud" (?). No cluds in the sky.
trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around January 7th 2013
